marklogic.body: This report is baffling. The muscle relaxant, Benadryl, marijuana and anti-Anxiety medicine likely made her very sleepy. Each one of these alone can cause Drowsiness (many adults, for example, use Bendaryl as a temporary sleep aid)--but all of these substances together must have made her tremendously drowsy causing her to fall asleep in the bath and not wake up even when she went under. Like Michael Jackson it sounds like she was battling extreme mid-life Anxiety and trying to self-medicate by using both illegal and prescription meds. Tragic.
